Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde are determined to get back to winning ways and will leave no stone unturned to claim maximum points in order to improve their position.
Mauritania will likely lower their expectations in their first-ever game in Cape Verde and would be happy to share the spoils.
Others: Cape Verde were brought to their knees in Group C's opening match against Egypt, who claimed a 3-0 win at the Cairo International Stadium.
Mauritania were stretched by Botswana in their opener in Group C but managed to snatch a lone-goal win late in the game.
Cape Verde defeated Mauritania 1-0 when the sides last met.
